Finger Exercise Lecture 9 Implement the function that meets the specifications below:
def dot_product(tA, tB): """ tA: a tuple of numbers tB: a tuple of numbers of the same length as tA Assumes tA and tB are the same length. Returns a tuple where the: * first element is the length of one of the tuples * second element is the sum of the pairwise products of tA and tB """ # Your code here # Examples: tA = (1, 2, 3) tB = (4, 5, 6) print(dot_product(tA, tB)) # prints (3,32) 6.100L Finger Exercises Lecture 9 Solutions
